name: Lootin' and Lovin'
description:
Lootin' and Lovin' is game created for Genre Mash Jam!

We decided to combine dating sim with top down slasher! You can bring loot to companions and that gives you relationship points which unlocks new dialogues!

Theme is reusable - so we are definitely not going to waste this loot! That's why we're gathering them - we are eco friendly, why buy things when you can reuse your enemies equipment?

Art by Bardiel:

https://twitter.com/bardiel93

Programming by Mumin:

https://twitter.com/GameDevMumin

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdk3O_YfSOgBibLnD8Y8Q2w

Used sounds on attribution licence:

https://freesound.org/people/beerbelly38/sounds/362349/ https://freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundFactory/sounds/274178/ http://teknoaxe.com/Link_Code_3.php?q=831

Controls:

WASD - walking

LPM - attack

R - restart

ESC - exit
